source-layers.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT the_geom_webmercator, to_char(effective, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as effectiveformatted, extract(epoch from effective) * 1000 as effective_epoch, ulurpno, status, project_na FROM planninglabs.zoning_map_amendments WHERE status = 'Adopted') a
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, ulurpno, status, project_na FROM zoning_map_amendments WHERE status = 'Certified'

meta.description: NYC GIS Zoning Features January 2019, Bytes of the Big Apple
